channel.title: Make an object check for items
channel.description: How would I make an object or command check to make sure the player isn't wearing any items when you click/use it. I'm trying to make dung for my server, but i'm not sure of how to do this.

item.title: Make an object check for items
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:20, topic:407171”] case ####: for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) { this.c.sendMessage("You can't take equipment into, "); return; } if (c.getItems().freeSlots() <= 27) { this.c.sendMessage("You can't take item's into, "); return; } else { c.getPA().startTeleport(X, Y, 0, "modern"); this.c.sendtMessage("You tele to, "); } break;
Here you go OP; it WILL Work.

@super, I was just kidding, I thought you would laugh at it, it was supposed to be a joke and you ruined it :([/quote]
dammit… i made my own though tell me if it’ll work. Also, I like a challenge.

[code]case ###:
if (c.getItems().freeSlots() <= 27) {
c.sendMessage(“You cannot take items into @@@@@, sorry.”);
return;
}

        for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) {
                if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) {
                    c.sendMessage("You cannot take equipment into @@@@@, sorry.");
                    return;
                }   
        }
       	c.getPA().startTeleport(X, Y, 0, "modern");
       	c.sendMessage("You have teleported to @@@@@");
        
        break;[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Make an object check for items

item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:20, topic:407171”] case ####: for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) { this.c.sendMessage("You can't take equipment into, "); return; } if (c.getItems().freeSlots() <= 27) { this.c.sendMessage("You can't take item's into, "); return; } else { c.getPA().startTeleport(X, Y, 0, "modern"); this.c.sendtMessage("You tele to, "); } break;
Here you go OP; it WILL Work.

@super, I was just kidding, I thought you would laugh at it, it was supposed to be a joke and you ruined it :([/quote]

Sex to you my friend.

item.source: Make an object check for items

item.title: Make an object check for items
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

		case ####:
			for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++)
				if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) {
					this.c.sendMessage("You can't take equipment into, ");
					return;
				}
			if (c.getItems().freeSlots() <= 27) {
				this.c.sendMessage("You can't take item's into, ");
				return;
			} else {
				c.getPA().startTeleport(X, Y, 0, "modern");
				this.c.sendtMessage("You tele to, ");
			}
			break;

Here you go OP; it WILL Work.

@super, I was just kidding, I thought you would laugh at it, it was supposed to be a joke and you ruined it

Read full topic
